page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: There is a flourishing assortment of clubs where Community Centres are in existence.For the younger members of the community clubs outside of school time range from Scout cubs,Brownies,Scouts,Guides,Youth Clubs and sports clubs.For the older members of the community clubs are run mainly for the enjoyment and fun.Clubs often link the new people with established residents to form friendship and help.The Women's Institute is a very old established club run from local village halls and specialises in raising money for charity whilst entertaining members who are female only.
